channel.title: retrospective on Thuyen's corner
channel.description: Recent content in retrospective on Thuyen's corner

item.title: ğŸ“ Looking back on 2020H1
item.description: June is coming to an end soon… It’s the end of month, the end of quarter, and also the end of the first half. It’s time to look back on what I have done so far. About future plans, I’d like to leave it open. Work 1 My work interest gradually shifted away from iOS. I have to admit that after a few years working as an iOS engineer, I started to like iOS a little less.
